constructor.details: Validates universities through registry and verifies allocations

params._allocations: Array of allocation percentages (in basis points)
params._stablecoin: Address of the stablecoin contract used for donations
params._universitySymbols: Array of university symbols from registry

donate(uint256).details: Requires prior approval of stablecoin transfer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueToken(address).details: Cannot be used to withdraw campaign stablecoins

startFunding().details: Distributes initial 70% to recipients and reserves 30%

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote().details: Voting weight is proportional to donation amount

donate(uint256).notice: Allows donors to contribute stablecoins to the fundraising

rescueToken(address).notice: Emergency function to recover non-campaign tokens

vote().notice: Allows donors to vote for cancelling the fundraising
